channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: NATO leader jets to D.C. after Trump's "tough" Zelensky meeting
item.description: NATO Secretary General Mark Rutte is scheduled to meet with President Trump at the White House on Wednesday, according to people familiar with the mat...

item.title: Gold and silver plunge after recent surge to record highs
item.description: Data: Financial Modeling Prep ; Chart: Axios Visuals Gold and silver futures plunged Tuesday, with gold in particular heading for its worst day in mor...

item.title: In a shift, White House says no plan for Trump-Putin summit
item.description: The White House has halted its work on a second summit between President Trump and Russian President Vladimir Putin, U.S. officials said. Why it matte...

item.title: Scoop: Democrats press Trump on preventing Israel from annexing West Bank
item.description: More than 40 Democratic Senators asked President Trump to "reinforce" his opposition to Israel annexing parts of the occupied West Bank, according to ...

item.title: Pardoned Jan. 6 rioter arrested, charged with plotting Hakeem Jeffries' assassination
item.description: A Jan. 6 rioter who was pardoned by President Trump earlier this year is facing charges of plotting to assassinate House Minority Leader Hakeem Jeffri...

item.title: Shooting by ICE officer in Los Angeles wounds motorist, U.S. marshal
item.description: Federal authorities said the driver had threatened officers with a vehicle while trying to flee an arrest.

item.title: Trump refugee plan seeks 7,000 Afrikaners — and virtually no one else
item.description: The Trump administration’s rush to process thousands of White South Africans as refugees coincides with plans for overall admissions set as low as 7,5...

item.title: Vance seeks to bolster fragile Gaza ceasefire on trip to Israel
item.description: Vice President JD Vance traveled to Israel as the U.S. tries to show that it will enforce a Gaza ceasefire deal that is off to a shaky start.

item.title: Tracking who Trump is appointing to fill key administration roles
item.description: Follow President Trump’s progress filling over 800 positions, among about 1,300 that require Senate confirmation, in this tracker from The Washington ...

item.title: Pardoned Jan. 6 rioter arrested over threat to kill Rep. Hakeem Jeffries
item.description: The House minority leader confirmed in a statement that he was the subject of a “credible death threat” from someone “with every intention to carry it...

item.title: Trump's approval holds steady despite unpopular policies, per new NYT poll
item.description: Trump’s strength with Republicans on the economy could prove to be a boon for the GOP.

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: Trump is selling a strong economy. Voters aren’t buying it.
item.description: Privately, aides concede voters remain uneasy about prices but argue their policies are beginning to turn things around.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
